sentence: Acute pericarditis may occur frequently after viral infections.
To our knowledge, influenza B virus infection complicated by pericarditis without myocardial involvement has never been reported.
Especially in autumn and winter periods, clinicians should include Influenza B virus infection on differential diagnosis of pericarditis with large pericardial effusion.
